page.title: 05CHARLTON-HANK.RECREATION
page.content: The{social life}of the people centres round the church,Womens Institute,Wives group,Flower club,Youth club,Mother and Toddlers club,Brownies,Whist club,Friday People Social Club & Yoga classes. The village hall is the venue for all the groups who contribute to most of the social events, village fete,harvest supper,cheese & wine parties, childrens parties and auctions etc.. Most of these events are enjoyed by all the family from grandparents to children. The V.W.H.Hunt meets in the area several times in the season. The game{snooker}is popular in a few homes.
